sys_hub_flow.description: Check stockrooms local to the Requested for to see if the requested item is in stock. If it is not available, check for substitutes.
sys_hub_flow.name: Find Local Stock

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Look up Stockrooms that support the Requested for Location
